mapper.select: select * from new_activity WHERE type=#{0} order by publishtime desc
SELECT , (POWER(MOD(ABS(longitude - #{0}),360),2) + POWER(ABS(latitude - #{1}),2)) AS distance FROM new_activity ORDER BY distance
